name: Throwing Axe
description: Throw an axe at the target dealing 25% damage.

name: Devastate
description: Hit your target with your equipped weapon for 30% damage.

name: Execute
description: Execute the target with your equipped weapon for 300% damage. Only usable on targets with less than 15% health.

name: Devastate Rank 1
description: Hit your target with your equipped weapon for 50% damage.

name: Whirlwind
description: Swing your equipped weapon 360 degrees dealing 100% damage to all enemies directiy araund you.

name: Devastate Rank 2
description: Hit your target with your equipped weapon for 75% damage.

name: Challenging Throw
description: Throw an axe at the target dealing 25% damage and forcing it to focus on you. Does not taunt players.

name: Whirlwind Rank 1
description: Swing your equipped weapon 360 degrees dealing 200% damage to all enemies directly around you.

name: Execute Rank 1
description: Execute the target with your equipped weapon for 400% damage. Only usable on targets with less than 15% health.

name: Whirlwind Rank 2
description: Swing your equipped weapon 360 degrees dealing 300% damage to all enemies directy around you.

name: Conjure Wooden Arrows
description: Conjure 35 wooden arrows.

name: Volley
description: Fire 3 arrows in rapid succession, each arrow deals 206 attack power and can crit.

name: Conjure Stone Arrows
description: Conjure 35 stone arrows.

name: Conjure Flint Arrows
description: Conjure 35 flint arrows.

name: Concussive Shot
description: Concuss the target, disengaging and causing them to strike out wildly at another attacker or retreat. Only works on targets attacking you or a party member. Does not affect players.

name: Conjure Tin Arrows
description: Conjure 35 tin arrows.

name: Headshot
description: Headshot the target with an arrow for 300% damage. Only usable on targets with less than 15% health.

name: Volley Rank 1
description: Fire 3 arroWs in rapid succession, each arrow deals 40% attack power and can crit.

name: Conjure Iron Arrows
description: Conjure 35 iron arrows.

name: Scatter Shot
description: Fire an arrow at all enemies clase to your target, each arrow deals 100% weapon damage.

name: Headshot Rank 1
description: Headshot the target with an arrow for 400% damage. Only usable on targets with less than 15% health.

name: Conjure Elven Arrows
description: Conjure 35 elven arrows.

name: Scatter Shot Rank 1
description: Fire an arrow at all enemies close to your target, each arrow deals 175% weapon damage.

name: Volley Rank 2
description: Fire 3 arrows in rapid succession, each arrow deals 60% attack power and can crit.

name: Conjure Pearl Arrows
description: Conjure 35 pearl arrows.

name: Scatter Shot Rank 2
description: Fire an arrow at all enemies clase to your target, each arrow deals 250% weapon damage.

name: Conjure Spiked Arrows
description: Conjure 35 spiked arrows.

name: Conjure Mythril Arrows

name: Conjure Diamond Arrows

name: Conjure Royal Arrows
description: Conjure 35 royal arrows.

name: Conjure Chaos Arrows
description: Conjure 1 chaos arrow.

name: Healing Hands
description: Heal yourself or an ally for 100% magic power.

name: Mind Games
description: Confuse the target, disengaging and causing them to strike out wildly at another attacker or retreat. Only works on targets attacking you or party member. Does not affect players.
